00035 WSESWrapperBase::WSESWrapperBase()
00036 : lib_(new WSESInstrument), instrumentLoaded_(false),
00037   activeDetectors_(0x0001), iteration_(0), startTime_(0),workingDir_(""),
00038   blockPointReady_(false), blockRegionReady_(false), resetDataBetweenIterations_(false)
00039 { 
00040   errors_ = WError::instance();
00041   
00042   instrumentLibraryName_ = "dll\\SESInstrument.dll";
00043 
00044   *sesInstrumentInfo_.Model = 0;
00045   *sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo = 0;
00046 
00047   // Create property database
00048   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("lib_description", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getLibDescription, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00049   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("lib_version", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getLibVersion, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00050   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("lib_error", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getLibError, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00051   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("lib_working_dir", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setLibWorkingDir, &WSESWrapperBase::getLibWorkingDir, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00052   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("instrument_library", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setInstrumentLibrary, &WSESWrapperBase::getInstrumentLibrary, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00053   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("instrument_status", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getInstrumentStatus, Property::TYPE_INT32)));
00054   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("always_delay_region", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setAlwaysDelayRegion, &WSESWrapperBase::getAlwaysDelayRegion, Property::TYPE_BOOL)));
00055   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("allow_io_with_detector", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setAllowIOWithDetector, &WSESWrapperBase::getAllowIOWithDetector, Property::TYPE_BOOL)));
00056   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("instrument_model", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getInstrumentModel, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00057   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("instrument_serial_no", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getInstrumentSerialNo, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00058   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("detector_info", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getDetectorInfo, Property::TYPE_DETECTORINFO)));
00059   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("detector_region", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setDetectorRegion, &WSESWrapperBase::getDetectorRegion, Property::TYPE_DETECTORREGION)));
00060   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("element_set_count", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getElementSetCount, Property::TYPE_INT32)));
00061   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("element_set", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setElementSet, &WSESWrapperBase::getElementSet, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00062   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("element_name_count", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getElementNameCount, Property::TYPE_INT32)));
00063   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("element_name", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getElementName, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00064   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("lens_mode_count", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getLensModeCount, Property::TYPE_INT32)));
00065   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("lens_mode", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setLensMode, &WSESWrapperBase::getLensMode, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00066   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("pass_energy_count", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::readOnlyStub, &WSESWrapperBase::getPassEnergyCount, Property::TYPE_INT32)));
00067   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("pass_energy", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setPassEnergy, &WSESWrapperBase::getPassEnergy, Property::TYPE_DOUBLE)));
00068 
00069   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("analyzer_region", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setAnalyzerRegion, &WSESWrapperBase::getAnalyzerRegion, Property::TYPE_ANALYZERREGION)));
00070   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("use_external_io", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setUseExternalIO, &WSESWrapperBase::getUseExternalIO, Property::TYPE_BOOL)));
00071   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("use_detector", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setUseDetector, &WSESWrapperBase::getUseDetector, Property::TYPE_BOOL)));
00072   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("use_spin", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setUseSpin, &WSESWrapperBase::getUseSpin, Property::TYPE_BOOL)));
00073   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("region_name", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setRegionName, &WSESWrapperBase::getRegionName, Property::TYPE_STRING)));
00074   properties_.insert(PropertyKeyValue("temp_file_name", Property(this, &WSESWrapperBase::setTempFileName, &WSESWrapperBase::getTempFileName, Property::TYPE_STRING)));

00099 int WSESWrapperBase::getInstrumentLibrary(int index, void *value, int &size)
00100 {
00101   char *strValue = reinterpret_cast<char *>(value);
00102   if (strValue != 0)
00103     strValue[std::string(SESWrapperNS::gLibraryName).copy(strValue, size)] = 0;
00104   size = strlen(SESWrapperNS::gLibraryName);
00105   return WError::ERR_OK;
00106 }

00183 int WSESWrapperBase::getLibWorkingDir(int index, void *value, int &size)
00184 {
00185   char *strValue = reinterpret_cast<char *>(value);
00186   if (strValue != 0)
00187     getcwd(strValue, size);
00188   else
00189   {
00190     strValue = getcwd(0, 0);
00191     size = strlen(strValue);
00192     free(strValue);
00193   }
00194         return WError::ERR_OK;
00195 }

00206 int WSESWrapperBase::getInstrumentStatus(int index, void *value, int &size)
00207 {
00208   int *status = reinterpret_cast<int *>(value);
00209   if (lib_->isLoaded() && lib_->GDS_GetStatus != 0)
00210     lib_->GDS_GetStatus(status);
00211   else
00212     *status = SesNS::NonOperational;
00213 
00214   return WError::ERR_OK;
00215 }

00309 int WSESWrapperBase::getDetectorInfo(int index, void *value, int &size)
00310 {
00311   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00312     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00313 
00314   SESWrapperNS::DetectorInfo *detectorInfo = reinterpret_cast<DetectorInfo *>(value);
00315 
00316   if (detectorInfo != 0)
00317   {
00318     SesNS::WDetectorInfo sesDetectorInfo;
00319     lib_->GDS_GetDetectorInfo(&sesDetectorInfo);
00320     detectorInfo->adcPresent_ = sesDetectorInfo.ADCPresent;
00321     detectorInfo->discPresent_ = sesDetectorInfo.DiscPresent;
00322     detectorInfo->frameRate_ = sesDetectorInfo.FramesPerSec;
00323     detectorInfo->maxChannels_ = sesDetectorInfo.MaxChannels;
00324     detectorInfo->maxSlices_ = sesDetectorInfo.MaxSlices;
00325     detectorInfo->timerControlled_ = sesDetectorInfo.TimerControlled;
00326     detectorInfo->xChannels_ = sesDetectorInfo.XChannels;
00327     detectorInfo->yChannels_ = sesDetectorInfo.YChannels;
00328   }
00329 
00330   return WError::ERR_OK;
00331 }

00343 int WSESWrapperBase::getDetectorRegion(int index, void *value, int &size)
00344 {
00345   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00346     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00347 
00348   SESWrapperNS::DetectorRegion *detectorRegion = reinterpret_cast<DetectorRegion *>(value);
00349 
00350   if (detectorRegion != 0)
00351   {
00352     detectorRegion->adcMode_ = sesRegion_.ADCMode;
00353     detectorRegion->firstXChannel_ = sesRegion_.FirstXChannel;
00354     detectorRegion->firstYChannel_ = sesRegion_.FirstYChannel;
00355     detectorRegion->lastXChannel_ = sesRegion_.LastXChannel;
00356     detectorRegion->lastYChannel_ = sesRegion_.LastYChannel;
00357     detectorRegion->slices_ = sesRegion_.Slices;
00358   }
00359 
00360   return WError::ERR_OK;
00361 }

00376 int WSESWrapperBase::getElementSetCount(int index, void *value, int &size)

00379     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00380

00384     *intValue = elementSets_.size();

00386         return WError::ERR_OK;

00401 int WSESWrapperBase::getElementSet(int index, void *value, int &size)
00402 {
00403   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00404     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00405 
00406   char *strValue = reinterpret_cast<char *>(value);
00407   int errorCode = WError::ERR_OK;
00408 
00409   if (index == -1)
00410   {
00411     if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrElementSet(strValue, &size) != 0)
00412             errorCode =  WError::ERR_FAIL;
00413   }
00414   else if (index >= 0 && index < int(elementSets_.size()))
00415   {
00416     if (strValue != 0)
00417       strValue[elementSets_[index].copy(strValue, size)] = 0;
00418     size = elementSets_[index].length();
00419   }
00420   else
00421     errorCode = WError::ERR_INDEX;
00422 
00423   return errorCode;
00424 }

00586 int WSESWrapperBase::getPassEnergy(int index, void *value, int &size)
00587 {
00588   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00589     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00590 
00591   double *doubleValue = reinterpret_cast<double *>(value);
00592   int errorCode = WError::ERR_OK;
00593 
00594   if (index == -1)
00595   {
00596     if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrPassEnergy(doubleValue) != 0)
00597             errorCode =  WError::ERR_FAIL;
00598   }
00599   else if (index >= 0 && index < int(passEnergies_.size()))
00600   {
00601     if (doubleValue != 0)
00602       *doubleValue = passEnergies_[index];
00603   }
00604   else
00605     errorCode = WError::ERR_INDEX;
00606 
00607   return errorCode;
00608 }

00620 int WSESWrapperBase::getAnalyzerRegion(int index, void *value, int &size)
00621 {
00622   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00623     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00624 
00625   SESWrapperNS::AnalyzerRegion *analyzerRegion = reinterpret_cast<SESWrapperNS::AnalyzerRegion *>(value);
00626   if (analyzerRegion != 0)
00627   {
00628     analyzerRegion->centerEnergy_ = sesRegion_.FixEnergy;
00629     analyzerRegion->dwellTime_ = sesRegion_.StepTime;
00630     analyzerRegion->energyStep_ = sesRegion_.EnergyStep;
00631     analyzerRegion->fixed_ = sesRegion_.Fixed;
00632     analyzerRegion->highEnergy_ = sesRegion_.HighEnergy;
00633     analyzerRegion->lowEnergy_ = sesRegion_.LowEnergy;
00634   }
00635   size = sizeof(SESWrapperNS::AnalyzerRegion);
00636   return WError::ERR_OK;
00637 }

00650 int WSESWrapperBase::getUseExternalIO(int index, void *value, int &size)

00753 int WSESWrapperBase::getUseSpin(int index, void *value, int &size)
00754 {
00755   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00756     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00757 
00758   bool *boolValue = reinterpret_cast<bool *>(value);
00759 
00760   int count = 0;
00761   lib_->GDS_GetOption(SesNS::DetectorCount, &count);
00762   ++index;
00763 
00764   *boolValue = false;
00765 
00766   if (count < 3)
00767     return WError::ERR_NOT_APPLICABLE;
00768 
00769   if (index < 2 || (count > 2 && index >= count))
00770     return WError::ERR_INDEX;
00771 
00772   unsigned short activeDetector = 0;
00773   lib_->GDS_GetOption(SesNS::ActiveDetector, &activeDetector);
00774   
00775   return WError::ERR_OK;
00776 }
00777 
00787 int WSESWrapperBase::getUseBindingEnergy(int index, void *value, int &size)
00788 {
00789   bool *boolValue = reinterpret_cast<bool *>(value);
00790 
00791   *boolValue = !sesRegion_.Kinetic;
00792   return WError::ERR_OK;
00793 }

00807   return WError::ERR_READONLY;

00809 
00818 int WSESWrapperBase::setLibWorkingDir(int index, const void *value)
00819 {
00820         const char *strValue = reinterpret_cast<const char *>(value);
00821         if (strValue != 0)
00822         {
00823                 struct stat info;
00824                 int statRC = stat(strValue, &info);
00825                 if (statRC != 0)
00826                         return WError::ERR_INVALID_DIR;
00827                 else
00828                 {
00829                         _chdir(strValue);
00830                         char *buffer = getcwd(0, 0);
00831                         workingDir_ = buffer;
00832                         free(buffer);
00833                         SetEnvironmentVariable("SES_BASE_DIR", workingDir_.c_str());
00834                 }
00835         }
00836         return WError::ERR_OK;
00837 }
00838 
00848 int WSESWrapperBase::setInstrumentLibrary(int index, const void *value)
00849 {
00850   const char *strValue = reinterpret_cast<const char *>(value);
00851   lib_->unload();
00852   if (strValue != 0)
00853   {
00854     instrumentLibraryName_ = strValue;
00855     if (!lib_->load(strValue))
00856       return WError::ERR_LOAD_LIBRARY;
00857   }
00858         return WError::ERR_OK;
00859 }
00860 
00870 int WSESWrapperBase::setAlwaysDelayRegion(int index, const void *value)
00871 {
00872   const bool *boolValue = reinterpret_cast<const bool *>(value);
00873   if (lib_->GDS_SetOption == 0)
00874     return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00875   lib_->GDS_SetOption(SesNS::AlwaysDelayRegion, boolValue);
00876         return WError::ERR_OK;
00877 }
00878 
00888 int WSESWrapperBase::setAllowIOWithDetector(int index, const void *value)
00889 {
00890   const bool *boolValue = reinterpret_cast<const bool *>(value);
00891   if (lib_->GDS_SetOption == 0)
00892     return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00893   lib_->GDS_SetOption(SesNS::AllowSignalsWithDetector, boolValue);
00894         return WError::ERR_OK;
00895 }
00896 
00906 int WSESWrapperBase::setDetectorRegion(int index, const void *value)
00907 {
00908   const DetectorRegion *detectorRegion = reinterpret_cast<const SESWrapperNS::DetectorRegion *>(value);
00909   if (detectorRegion != 0)
00910   {
00911     sesRegion_.ADCMode = detectorRegion->adcMode_;
00912     sesRegion_.FirstXChannel = detectorRegion->firstXChannel_;
00913     sesRegion_.LastXChannel = detectorRegion->lastXChannel_;
00914     sesRegion_.FirstYChannel = detectorRegion->firstYChannel_;
00915     sesRegion_.LastYChannel = detectorRegion->lastYChannel_;
00916     sesRegion_.Slices = detectorRegion->slices_;
00917 
00918     if (lib_->GDS_SetGlobalDetector != 0)
00919     {
00920       sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMask = sesRegion_.ADCMask;
00921       sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMode = detectorRegion->adcMode_;
00922       sesDetectorRegion_.DiscLvl = sesRegion_.DiscLvl;
00923       sesDetectorRegion_.FirstXChannel = detectorRegion->firstXChannel_;
00924       sesDetectorRegion_.LastXChannel = detectorRegion->lastXChannel_;
00925       sesDetectorRegion_.FirstYChannel = detectorRegion->firstYChannel_;
00926       sesDetectorRegion_.LastYChannel = detectorRegion->lastYChannel_;
00927       sesDetectorRegion_.Slices = detectorRegion->slices_;
00928       lib_->GDS_SetGlobalDetector(&sesDetectorRegion_);
00929     }
00930   }
00931   return WError::ERR_OK;
00932 }
00933 
00943 int WSESWrapperBase::setElementSet(int index, const void *value)
00944 {
00945   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00946     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00947 
00948   const char *strValue = reinterpret_cast<const char *>(value);
00949   return lib_->GDS_SetElementSet(strValue) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_INCORRECT_ELEMENT_SET;
00950 }
00951 
00962 int WSESWrapperBase::setLensMode(int index, const void *value)
00963 {
00964   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00965     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00966 
00967   const std::string strValue = reinterpret_cast<const char *>(value);
00968   int errorCode = lib_->GDS_SetLensMode(strValue.c_str()) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_INCORRECT_LENS_MODE;
00969   if (errorCode == WError::ERR_OK)
00970     sesRegion_.LensMode[strValue.copy(sesRegion_.LensMode, 32)] = 0;
00971         return errorCode;
00972 }
00973 
00984 int WSESWrapperBase::setPassEnergy(int index, const void *value)
00985 {
00986   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00987     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00988 
00989   double doubleValue = *reinterpret_cast<const double *>(value);
00990   int errorCode = lib_->GDS_SetPassEnergy(doubleValue) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_INCORRECT_PASS_ENERGY;
00991   doubleValue = sesRegion_.PassEnergy;
00992   if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrPassEnergy(&doubleValue) == 0)
00993     sesRegion_.PassEnergy = doubleValue;
00994 
00995         return errorCode;
00996 }
00997 
01009 int WSESWrapperBase::setAnalyzerRegion(int index, const void *value)
01010 {
01011   const WAnalyzerRegion *analyzerRegion = reinterpret_cast<const WAnalyzerRegion *>(value);
01012   if (analyzerRegion != 0)
01013   {
01014     sesRegion_.DriftRegion = false;
01015     sesRegion_.EnergyStep = analyzerRegion->energyStep_;
01016     sesRegion_.Fixed = analyzerRegion->fixed_;
01017     sesRegion_.FixEnergy = analyzerRegion->centerEnergy_;
01018     sesRegion_.Grating = 0;
01019     sesRegion_.HighEnergy = analyzerRegion->highEnergy_;
01020     sesRegion_.Illumination = 0;
01021     sesRegion_.LowEnergy = analyzerRegion->lowEnergy_;
01022     sesRegion_.Order = 0;
01023     sesRegion_.Slit = 0;
01024     sesRegion_.StepTime = analyzerRegion->dwellTime_;
01025     sesRegion_.UseRegionDetector = true;
01026   }
01027   return WError::ERR_OK;
01028 }

01038 int WSESWrapperBase::setUseExternalIO(int index, const void *value)
01039 {
01040   const bool *boolValue = reinterpret_cast<const bool *>(value);
01041   if (boolValue != 0)
01042     activeDetectors_ = *boolValue ? activeDetectors_ | 0x0002 : activeDetectors_ & ~0x0002;
01043   return WError::ERR_OK;
01044 }
01045 
01056 int WSESWrapperBase::setUseSpin(int index, const void *value)
01057 {
01058   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
01059     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
01060 
01061   const bool *boolValue = reinterpret_cast<const bool *>(value);
01062 
01063   int count = 0;
01064   lib_->GDS_GetOption(SesNS::DetectorCount, &count);
01065 
01066   if (count < 3)
01067     return WError::ERR_NOT_APPLICABLE;
01068 
01069   if (index < 2 || (count > 2 && index >= count))
01070     return WError::ERR_INDEX;
01071 
01072   unsigned short activeDetector = 0;
01073   lib_->GDS_SetOption(SesNS::ActiveDetector, &activeDetector);
01074   
01075   return WError::ERR_OK;
01076 }

01088 {

01090   if (boolValue != 0)
01091     sesRegion_.Kinetic = !*boolValue;
01092   return WError::ERR_OK;
01093 }

01108     activeDetectors_ = *boolValue ? activeDetectors_ | 0x0001 : activeDetectors_ & ~0x0001;
01109   return WError::ERR_OK;

01157 
01163 bool WSESWrapperBase::loadElementSets()
01164 {
01165   elementSets_.clear();
01166 
01167   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
01168     return false;
01169 
01170   char *buffer = 0;
01171   int bufferSize = 0;
01172   
01173   bool success = (lib_->GDS_GetElementSets(buffer, &bufferSize) == 0);
01174   if (success)
01175   {
01176     buffer = new char[bufferSize];
01177     success = (lib_->GDS_GetElementSets(buffer, &bufferSize) == 0);
01178     splitSESList(buffer, bufferSize, elementSets_);
01179     delete[] buffer;
01180   }
01181 
01182   return success;
01183 }
01184 
01190 bool WSESWrapperBase::loadLensModes()
01191 {
01192   lensModes_.clear();
01193 
01194   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
01195     return false;
01196 
01197   char *buffer = 0;
01198   int bufferSize = 0;
01199   
01200   bool success = (lib_->GDS_GetLensModes(buffer, &bufferSize) == 0);
01201   if (success)
01202   {
01203     buffer = new char[bufferSize];
01204     success = (lib_->GDS_GetLensModes(buffer, &bufferSize) == 0);
01205     splitSESList(buffer, bufferSize, lensModes_);
01206     delete[] buffer;
01207   }
01208 
01209   return success;
01210 }
01211 
01217 bool WSESWrapperBase::loadPassEnergies(const std::string &lensMode, DoubleVector &result)
01218 {
01219   passEnergies_.clear();
01220 
01221   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
01222     return false;
01223 
01224   char *buffer = 0;
01225   int bufferSize = 0;
01226 
01227   result.clear();
01228   bool success = (lib_->GDS_GetPassEnergies(lensMode.c_str(), buffer, &bufferSize) == 0);
01229 
01230   if (success)
01231   {
01232     buffer = new char[bufferSize];
01233     success = (lib_->GDS_GetPassEnergies(lensMode.c_str(), buffer, &bufferSize) == 0 && buffer[0] != 0);
01234     if (success)
01235     {
01236       NameVector strResult;
01237       splitSESList(buffer, bufferSize, strResult);
01238       for (int i = 0; i < int(strResult.size()); i++)
01239         result.push_back(atof(strResult[i].c_str()));
01240     }
01241     delete[] buffer;
01242   }
01243 
01244   return success;
01245 }
01246 
01252 bool WSESWrapperBase::loadElementNames()
01253 {
01254   elementNames_.clear();
01255 
01256   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
01257     return false;
01258   
01259   if (lib_->GDS_GetElements == 0)
01260     return true; // Optional function, should not generate errors.
01261 
01262   char *buffer = 0;
01263   int size = 0;
01264   int result = lib_->GDS_GetElements(0, &size);
01265   buffer = new char[size];
01266   result = lib_->GDS_GetElements(buffer, &size);
01267   splitSESList(buffer, size, elementNames_);
01268   delete[] buffer;
01269   return true;
01270 }
01271 
01280 void WSESWrapperBase::splitSESList(const char *buffer, int bufferSize, NameVector &result)
01281 {
01282   std::istringstream istr(buffer);
01283   while (istr.good())
01284   {
01285     std::string item;
01286     if (istr.peek() == '"')
01287     {
01288       istr.get();
01289       std::getline(istr, item, '"');
01290       result.push_back(item);
01291     }
01292     istr.get();
01293     istr >> std::ws;
01294   }
01295 }
